definitions.title: n.pr.loc.
definitions.body: Keeila: in Judah, toward Philistines, ´[[ק]]: 1Sa 23:1 + 13 t. 1Sa 23 ([[קְעִלָה]], v:3.13); Jos 15:44 (P) , cf. 2Ch 4:19 (geneal. scheme); post-ex. [[פֶּלֶח קְעִילָךְ]] Ne 3:17, Ne 3:18; mod. Kîlā, c. 8 m. NW. from Hebron, GASm:Geogr. 230 Buhl:Geogr. 193; cl. TelAm. Ḳilti Wkl:No. 165, 11, 18, etc.
